segments.text: The kitchen looks so ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window makes everything bright.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I notice the water spilling out of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over, making a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying dishes, completely unaware she's in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy on the stoolâ€”he's reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is tilting back dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll fall right into the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's helping him, hand out for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel my heart racing just watching this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is calm, but here it's all risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Please, let nothing bad happen to those kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a real accident so quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR
